Name: Cashflow Supervision
Title: Golden Blood-Tide: Cashflow Supervision
Desc: "The overseer made of precision machinery rumbles as it observes the monetary flow of the tiny nation,\nTirelessly recording the movement of every amount of money, the savings and spending of all,\nThe changes in value, and the number of times each piece of currency is circulated over a specific period."

Talent.Name: Cashflow Supervision
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes DMG or is healed:</color> This character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> this Round costs 1 less $[K309] and deals +1 DMG. (Max 2 times per Round)\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3201}Catalyst Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)

K309.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>
K309.Desc: You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
